price: តែបងប្អូនរបស់ពួកគេ(ស្ហៃតននិងជិន)នៅតែជំរុញពួក គេឱ្យធ្លាក់ក្នុងភាពវងេ្វង ក្រោយមកពួកគេគ្មានទីបពា្ចប់ឡើយ។
arabic: وَإِخۡوَٰنُهُمۡ يَمُدُّونَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡغَيِّ ثُمَّ لَا يُقۡصِرُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: wa-ikh'wānuhum yamuddūnahum fī al-ghayi thumma lā yuq'ṣirūna
